content:
Just found out about this tool, but looks of potential interest/use to other zulip readers:
doc: https://gcm-filters.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
JOSS paper: https://joss.theoj.org/papers/10.21105/joss.03947
AMS talk: https://noraloose.github.io/ams2022-talk/#/
github repo: https://github.com/ocean-eddy-cpt/gcm-filters
